verbose_text: The efficacy of PARP inhibitors against HR deficient cells can be explained by various mechanisms, including inhibition of base excision repair, trapping of PARP- DNA complexes at the replication fork, enhancement of toxic NHEJ in PARP1 deficient cells, and inhibition of PARP1 / Poltheta- mediated alternative end joining.
evidence: PARP- DNA complexes at the replication fork, enhancement of toxic NHEJ in PARP1-deficient cells, and inhibition of PARP1/Poltheta- mediated alternative end
